title: Splash Pro v 1.2.4.0 HD Player
description:
Splash Pro v 1.2.4.0 HD Player

- Subtitles support improvements (font type, font size, font color)
- Multi S/PDIF and HDMI audio output support added
- Multi-display improvements
- HD Camcorder interactive menu improvements
- Small GUI improvements
- [b]Motion2 with hardware acceleration on Windows 7 fixed[/b]
- Fast Forward and Rewind added in HD Camcorder browsing mode
- (shortcuts: "," = Rewind, "." = Fast Forward")
- Chapter browsing support added for HD Camcorder mode
- AVI, MP4 and MKV playback improvements
- Multi-display video playback performance improvements
- FLAC audio playback improvements
- Numerous user interface improvements


Supported:
(AVI, MKV, MOV, M2TS, MTS, M2T, MP4, MPG, TS)
(H.264, MPEG-2, VC-1, DVIX\XVID)
audio (AC-3, AAC LC, HE-AAC, MPEG Layer I/II, Linear PCM, DTS)
